DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder

public DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder(String original,
                                                             String suggested)
Create a suggested query string builder with the given original and suggested query strings

Parameters:
original - the original query - probably from a user
suggested - the suggested query - probably from the Compass suggestion engine
Method Detail

userFriendly

public DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder userFriendly(boolean userFriendly)
Enable/disable whether queries suggested by toSuggestedQueryString() are user-frienly, ie, look like the user's original query. This feature is enabled by default If you disable this feature, the emulateCapitalisation setting is ignored and the suggested query is returned by toSuggestedQueryString as-is

Parameters:
userFriendly - true or false to enable or disable
Returns:
this

emulateCapitalisation

public DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder emulateCapitalisation(boolean emulateCapitalisation)
Enable/disable the emulation of capitalised words. This feature is enabled by default

Parameters:
emulateCapitalisation - true or false to enable or disable
Returns:
this

allowSame

public DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder allowSame(boolean allowSame)
Enable/disable whether to allow the same query to be suggested as the original This is enabled by default

Parameters:
allowSame - true or false to enable or disable
Returns:
this

toSuggestedQueryString

public String toSuggestedQueryString()
                              throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
Get the suggested query based on the options set

Returns:
the suggested query string or null if allowSame is false and the queries match
Throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException - if either original or suggested query is invalid

escape

public DefaultSuggestQueryMethod.SuggestedQueryStringBuilder escape(boolean escape)
